payload.message: Run the research cycle: first scan markets with `python3 skills/poly-scanner/scripts/scan_markets.py --mode quick`, then analyze the top 3 unresearched opportunities with `python3 skills/poly-research/scripts/research.py --from-scanner --top 3`. For any opportunity with edge score >= 50, execute a paper trade via poly-simulator. Log all findings.

Run the daily learning cycle: 1) Check market resolutions and score predictions with `python3 skills/poly-simulator/scripts/learning.py`. 2) Evolve strategy parameters with `python3 skills/poly-simulator/scripts/simulator.py --evolve`. 3) Check graduation progress with `python3 skills/poly-simulator/scripts/simulator.py --graduation-check`. Log all parameter changes and weight updates.

Generate today's trading summary for Telegram delivery. Run `python3 skills/poly-simulator/scripts/simulator.py --status` and format the results as a daily report: bankroll and % change, positions opened/closed today, current win rate and Sharpe ratio, any notable events (stop losses hit, large moves, whale activity). Keep it scannable with emoji headers.

Weekly performance review for Telegram delivery. Analyze the past 7 days: 1) Run `python3 skills/poly-simulator/scripts/simulator.py --status` for current metrics. 2) Run `python3 skills/poly-simulator/scripts/simulator.py --evolution-log` for strategy changes. 3) Run `python3 skills/poly-simulator/scripts/simulator.py --graduation-check` for progress. Summarize: weekly P&L, best/worst trades, strategy parameter evolution, agent weight changes, graduation progress percentage, and suggested focus areas for next week.
